forecastday.fcttext: Mostly clear. Lows overnight in the mid 50s.

forecastday.title: Friday

forecastday.title: Friday Night

forecastday.title: Saturday

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early giving way to a few showers after midnight. Low 12C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy during the evening. A few showers developing later during the night. Low 54F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 30%.
